review: This little bugger gets use regularly in my room. The fact I can cast from netflix, my own desktop or my tablet is freaking beautiful. Anything I want to watch from sources like Youtube, Netflix or most other big brand name streaming services, on my 42" Sharp LCD TV. For $35 this thing is a steal. I'm not surprised there were problems getting enough to be shipped when it first came out, it's a fantastic deal that works with either iOS or Android devices. What more could you ask? Go and buy one!
